knimeNode.name: EdgeR
knimeNode.shortDescription: This node can detect differential expressed genes using the EdgeR package.

fullDescription.intro: This node can find differential expressed genes using the EdgeR package. It takes as input a count table and a annotation file.

option.name: method for calculation of normalization factors

fullDescription.option: method which is used for calculation of the normalization factors against different library sizes (default: TMM)
method which is used for p-value correction against multiple testing (default: BH)

ports.inPort:
Row names: ID of feature
Cell 1...n: count of feature in sample
Must contain a header line with the names of the samples

Row names Name of the sample like it is named in the count table
Cell 1: condition (should only contain two conditions)
ports.outPort:
Cell 0: ID of feature
Cell 1: log2 foldchange
Cell 2: average log2 CPM expression
Cell 3: P-Value
Cell 4: adjusted P-Value
